an3.43:1.1: “Tayo, bhikkhave, atthavase sampassamanena alameva paresam dhammam desetum.
an3.43:1.3: Yo dhammam deseti so atthappatisamvedi ca hoti dhammappatisamvedi ca.
an3.43:1.4: Yo dhammam sunati so atthappatisamvedi ca hoti dhammappatisamvedi ca.
an3.43:1.5: Yo ceva dhammam deseti yo ca dhammam sunati ubho atthappatisamvedino ca honti dhammappatisamvedino ca.
an3.43:1.6: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo atthavase sampassamanena alameva paresam dhammam desetun”ti.
